import React from "react" import { ListGroup } from "reactstrap" import CartItem from "./CartItem" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import "../../../styles/shoppingCarts.css" import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" import { cartUiActions } from "../../../store/shopping-Cart/cartUiSlice" const Carts = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cartProducts = useSelector((state) => state.cart.cartItems) const totalAmount = use const toggleCart = () => { dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle()) } return (
{cartProducts.length === 0 ? (
No item added yet
) : ( cartProducts.map((item, index) => ) )}
Subtotal amount : $123
) } export default Carts
